section.name: Unit 4:​ What Tools Can You Use to Integrate Technology?
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 4: What Tools Can You Use to Integrate Technology?

In the previous two units, you learned about why technology is important for instruction and learning, and how to integrate technology into an existing lesson.

Now we move to the question of what tools to use. 

In Unit 4, we will use the Digital Skills Library to study the 10 domains of digital skills and the technology tools that support them. We will also read two teachers' reflections on their experiences with using technology tools.

After taking this unit you will be able to:

  • identify technology tools that can support your teaching and​
  • describe the 10 domains of digital skills.

Select the Unit 4 link below to begin the lessons for this unit.
